\N<Dasher>That's because I escaped from you guys early on.

\N<Architect>It all started a long tme ago.
\N<Architect>Architects usually had control of these towers

more devious uses, which started to anger people.

when people started to fight each other.
\N<Architect>And Architects were the first target after the

many chameleons would hunt... for fun.
disappeared, we still went into hiding.

prototype," but they never got to show us.

\N<Seven>I didn't see the scientist since then.
